title: Railworks TS2015 Virtual Railroads Series 111 blue-beige EL
description:
Series 111 blue-beige Expertline

The Lokpaket includes 8 locomotives of type 111 series in the colors blue beige. 
Four of the locomotives are equipped with dynamic numbers, four locomotives have 
fixed numbers and are in the facilities (buffer, pantograph) and the 
label ( DB logo) differently


The vehicles have a very high level of realism in the 
use and therefore a very high demand on the driver!


RailWorks 3 features (raindrops, light cone)
Prototypical handling during acceleration and braking
replicated thyristor Stage Controller with 28 steps
Overload protection in power intrusion and wheel slip
acoustic wheel slip, and slip-warning
Monitoring of the motor and heating switch off when exceeding 
the limit values Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹according to performance intrusion
manually operated driving motor fan for cooling the traction motors with 
effect on the simulation and the engine warming
Malfunctions such isolation contactor failure and bailing sand container
ZWS and ZDS modes for 'real' push-pull trains and double traction
SIFA and PZB90 (PZB90 only in conjunction with the Mitgel. INDUSI magnet)
TAV door control (manual closing) for equipped cars
ZZA (destination display) with predetermined trip destinations
manually separately controllable pantograph
Notification window / vR Message System
continuous beam control and two-stage driver's cab light
realistic sound (optimized for EAX sound cards)
separately adapted AI Sound
Option files for AI and player


NOTE THIS WORKS IN PIRATED AND LEGIT OF TRAIN SIMULATOR 2015
